page.title: 07LOCAL SHOPS.
page.content: I think that Gateway supermarket is quite useful and it sells essential things and one bit of the shop sells medicines.I think that the bakery isn't very important and there are loads in Norton. I think there ought to be a bank in its place. I think that the wool shop isn't very important because you could go without wool.I think a post office would be more useful. The butcher's is very good because we need meat everyday. The newsagent is a very good one it sells alot of other things as well as sweets.Also there's a greengrocer's which I think is unnecessary because you can get fruit and vegetables at Gateway.Across the road there's a good but expensive hairdresser's.Next door to that there is a pub called the Centenary. It's handy because there's a bar and a restaurant.
